actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to liberalize the service requirement for pension eligibility based on World War I service.

summary.text: Makes a veteran eligible for a pension allowance if he was in active military duty for any period of time during World War I (presently 90 days required). (Amends 38 U.S.C. 521(g)(1),(2),(3))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code to liberalize the service requirement for pension eligibility based on World War I service.
